game.description: In the Land of Dragons, there is an ancient sword, rumored to grant immense power to its bearer. You have been tasked with finding this legendary sword and returning it to the kingdom.
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient sword from its hidden location.
game.reward: The chosen one shall gain the sword's power and become the true ruler of the kingdom.

tasks.description: Visit the wise old sage in the Forest of Wisdom to seek guidance.
tasks.objective: Obtain the sage's advice on the sword's location.

tasks.description: Venture into the Cavern of Challenges to test your skills and prove your worth.
tasks.objective: Overcome the trials and receive the key to the sword's secret chamber.

tasks.description: Navigate through the Enchanted Maze to find the entrance to the sword's hidden resting place.
tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the chamber where the sword lies.

tasks.description: Make your way through the Chamber of Guardians and defeat the fearsome creatures protecting the sword.
tasks.objective: Defeat the guardians and claim the ancient sword.

tasks.description: Return to the kingdom and present the sword to King Arthur, proving your worthiness.
tasks.objective: Bring the sword back to King Arthur and fulfill your destiny.

game.title: The Quest for the Ancient Sword
